allow:
Bash(python3 -c "
import subprocess
import signal
import time

# 启动进程
proc = subprocess.Popen\(
    [''uv'', ''run'', ''python'', ''learning_examples/01_websockets/realtime_all_perpetuals.py''],
    stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
    stderr=subprocess.STDOUT,
    text=True
\)

# 读取8秒的输出
output_lines = []
start_time = time.time\(\)
while time.time\(\) - start_time < 8:
    line = proc.stdout.readline\(\)
    if line:
        output_lines.append\(line.rstrip\(\)\)
        if len\(output_lines\) >= 30:  # 只保留前30行
            break
    time.sleep\(0.1\)

# 终止进程
proc.send_signal\(signal.SIGINT\)
time.sleep\(1\)
proc.terminate\(\)

# 打印输出
for line in output_lines[:30]:
    print\(line\)
")

Bash(uv run python3 -c "
import subprocess
import signal
import time

# 启动进程
proc = subprocess.Popen\(
    [''uv'', ''run'', ''python'', ''learning_examples/01_websockets/realtime_all_perpetuals_sdk.py''],
    stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
    stderr=subprocess.STDOUT,
    text=True
\)

# 读取8秒的输出
output_lines = []
start_time = time.time\(\)
while time.time\(\) - start_time < 8:
    line = proc.stdout.readline\(\)
    if line:
        output_lines.append\(line.rstrip\(\)\)
        if len\(output_lines\) >= 30:  # 只保留前30行
            break
    time.sleep\(0.1\)

# 终止进程
proc.send_signal\(signal.SIGINT\)
time.sleep\(1\)
proc.terminate\(\)

# 打印输出
for line in output_lines[:30]:
    print\(line\)
")
